testsuite.name: eco.emergi.embit.android.services.AppStateManagerTest

testcase.name: test unauthenticated state does not trigger sync
test automatic sync is triggered when user authenticates
test loading state does not trigger sync
test manual sync uses correct parameters
test sync only runs once per session
